They spoke about the peaceful protest that had been held for the 31st day straight. Their intentions were peaceful, as many millions of protestors had attended with their families over the past weeks. It was their 21st day straight at the protest site. Proud of themselves and the progress made. They knew it was never going to be easy.   Their intentions and actions have been continuously peaceful. The activities at the protest site have not only been peaceful, but very innovative and colorful. _A colorful revolution. She said that their generation was on the verge of transforming the entire country. They had achieved unimaginable progress towards transforming their future. Not only their future but the future of the past, present and future generations. He said the peaceful protest was unprecedented. They spoke about Ghandi, Martin Luther King and even Nelsen Mandela. They expected a positive outcome that day. This was a massive victory. A victory achieved through non-violence. A great achievement for innocent people.   Now she sits at the same location in the dark physically beaten by mobs. Whilst he is at hospital assaulted. She thinks of him. She does not know how well he is doing. Whether he is ok? Whether he is thinking of her? Whether he knows she is ok? She wants quick news. But there is no communication. Her tears continue to fall. Tears of sorrow mixed with courage to continue the fight through non – violent means stronger than before. She knows that they will win. She knows her courage is far greater than the goons and thugs.   The cronies and thugs used violence in an unprecedented manner. They took the law to their hands. Abused the innocent non-violent protestors. Although, they were brutally assaulted; determination, righteousness, humility, patience, long suffering and non-violence has been the cornerstone of their struggle for a future that can be rejoiced and celebrated.   Today, she thought that we are marching towards our goal. Success will come their way. The peaceful struggle will continue.   She looked to the dark sky. She received a message from him. “hope you will get this message, How are you? I am ok” he wrote.
